sentence.text: Dominantly inherited digitotalar dysmorphism (regulation of cellular amino acid metabolic process), which is characterised by flexion contractures of digits and 'rocker-bottom' feet due to a vertical talus, was first described in a South African family of European stock in 1972.

entity.text: regulation of cellular amino acid metabolic process

sentence.text: Since the distal arthrogryposes (DAs) are genetically heterogeneous, an unbiased approach to mutation identification was undertaken through whole-exome next-generation sequencing of DNA from a single regulation of cellular amino acid metabolic process-affected female.

entity.text: regulation of cellular amino acid metabolic process
